blogPost.title: From @WSJopinion: “The inherent purpose of a gun is to kill. An item whose sole purpose is bloodshed does not deserve the protection of the Constitution,” writes Max Willner-Giwerc, a student at the University of Chicago Law School https://t.co/t7osffIaJk
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: 来自@WSJopinion。"枪的固有目的是杀人。芝加哥大学法学院的学生Max Willner-Giwerc写道："一个以流血为唯一目的的物品不值得宪法的保护，" https://t.co/t7osffIaJk
來自@WSJopinion。"槍的固有目的是殺人。芝加哥大學法學院的學生Max Willner-Giwerc寫道："一個以流血爲唯一目的的物品不值得憲法的保護，" https://t.co/t7osffIaJk

previous.title: All 21 victims of the Texas elementary school massacre were in one classroom, where the shooter barricaded himself, a law-enforcement official said https://t.co/pYWtzfwPPd

localize.full_text: テキサス州の小学校で起きた大量殺戮事件の犠牲者21人全員が、犯人がバリケードを築いた1つの教室にいたと、法執行当局が発表した。 https://t.co/pYWtzfwPPd
一名执法官员说，德克萨斯州小学大屠杀的所有21名受害者都在一间教室里，枪手在那里把自己关起来，https://t.co/pYWtzfwPPd。
一名執法官員說，德克薩斯州小學大屠殺的所有21名受害者都在一間教室裏，槍手在那裏把自己關起來，https://t.co/pYWtzfwPPd。
